fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Budget, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication, European Neighbourhood Policy
eu_initiatives: Youth policies and youth engagement at the EU level, H2020 grants.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Participatory Budgeting projects in several italian municipalities, schools and jails.
goals__remit:
BiPart is a social enterprise and innovative startup who deals with the research, design and implementation of participatory budgeting and democratic innovations through deliberative tools and digital civic technologies.  
The goal is the improvement of people’s everyday life through collaboration, idea and info exchange, commons safeguard and experimentation of new ways of interaction and democratic governance.
